text: Eskdale School is a coeducational secondary school located in Whitby, North Yorkshire, England. The school is named after Eskdale a valley that runs from Whitby to Westerdale. It is a community school administered by North Yorkshire County Council. Eskdale School currently has just over 500 students. From September 2017 it became an 11 to 16 school. This has increased the school size to 550 students from September 2018. In February 2019 Eskdale School agreed to federate with nearby Caedmon College. ==References== ==External links== *Eskdale School official website Category:Secondary schools in North Yorkshire Category:Whitby Category:Community schools in North Yorkshire
title: Eskdale School
